body:
Hello @josesho! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/plotting/_misc.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/0311404e118af67495fd50d0fb52132c11247731/pandas/plotting/_misc.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 574:1](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/0311404e118af67495fd50d0fb52132c11247731/pandas/plotting/_misc.py#L574): [W293](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W293) blank line contains whitespace
> [Line 575:1](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/0311404e118af67495fd50d0fb52132c11247731/pandas/plotting/_misc.py#L575): [E302](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E302) expected 2 blank lines, found 1
> [Line 575:30](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/0311404e118af67495fd50d0fb52132c11247731/pandas/plotting/_misc.py#L575): [W291](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W291) trailing whitespace
> [Line 577:31](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/0311404e118af67495fd50d0fb52132c11247731/pandas/plotting/_misc.py#L577): [W291](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W291) trailing whitespace
> [Line 578:41](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/0311404e118af67495fd50d0fb52132c11247731/pandas/plotting/_misc.py#L578): [W291](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W291) trailing whitespace
